root.name: Dragon Blade: Wrath of Fire
root.description: OverviewDragon Blade: Wrath of Fire is an action game developed by Land Ho and Published by D3 Publisher. Dragon Blade was released on September 25, 2007 for the Nintendo Wii. The player takes the role of Dal who is on a quest to recover the six legendary pieces of the Dragon Blade. Each piece of the blade is trapped in the soul of a different dragon. Dal must kill the dragons and steal their souls so he can return the Dragon Blade to its normal state and vanquish all evil.ControlsFire DragonDragon Blade uses the Wii remote which acts as the weapon the player in the game is holding. The players weapons include a sword, a dragon's head, a dragon's fist, two dragon's fists, a dragon's tail and dragon's wings.
